trans-unit.source: Defines the writer, resource, print ticket, and package relationship settings that are associated with a specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument" />.
trans-unit.target: Definisce il writer, la risorsa, il print ticket e le impostazioni di relazione del package associate all'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument" />specificato.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsPackagingPolicy" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsPackagingPolicy" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsPackagingPolicy" />.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument" /> associato all'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsPackagingPolicy" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsPackagingPolicy" /> class for a specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument" />.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsPackagingPolicy" /> per una classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument" /> specificata.

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] document that the packaging policy applies to.
trans-unit.target: Documento [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] a cui si applicano i criteri di creazione del pacchetto.

trans-unit.source: The order in which to interleave document elements.
trans-unit.target: L'ordine nel quale effettuare l’interleave di elementi del documento.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsPackagingPolicy" /> class with a specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument" /> and specified interleave order.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsPackagingPolicy" /> con un <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument" /> specificato ed un ordine interleave specificato.

trans-unit.source: The resource identifier of the color context.
trans-unit.target: L'identificatore della risorsa del contesto del colore.

trans-unit.source: Acquires the resource stream for a specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsColorContext" />.
trans-unit.target: Acquisisce il flusso di risorsa per un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsColorContext" /> specificato.

trans-unit.source: The resource stream for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsColorContext" /> that has the specified <paramref name="resourceId" />.
trans-unit.target: Flusso di risorsa per l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsColorContext" /> con <paramref name="resourceId" /> specificato.

trans-unit.source: Acquires the resource stream for an <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsFont" />.
trans-unit.target: Acquisisce il flusso della risorsa per <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsFont" />.

trans-unit.source: Acquires the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsResourceStream" /> for the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsFont" />.
trans-unit.target: Acquisisce <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsResourceStream" /> per l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsFont" /> corrente.

trans-unit.source: The resource stream for the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsFont" />.
trans-unit.target: Il flusso della risorsa per il <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsFont" />corrente.

trans-unit.source: The identifier of the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] font.
trans-unit.target: L'identificatore del tipo di carattere di [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: Acquires the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsResourceStream" /> for a specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsFont" />.
trans-unit.target: Acquisisce <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsResourceStream" /> per <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsFont" />specificato.

trans-unit.source: The resource stream for the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] font that has the specified <paramref name="resourceId" />.
trans-unit.target: Il flusso della risorsa per il tipo di carattere del [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] che ha il <paramref name="resourceId" />specificato.

trans-unit.source: The resource identifier of the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] image.
trans-unit.target: Identificatore di risorsa dell'immagine [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: Acquires the resource stream for a specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsImage" />.
trans-unit.target: Acquisisce il flusso di risorsa per un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsImage" /> specificato.

trans-unit.source: The resource stream for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsImage" /> that has the specified <paramref name="resourceId" />.
trans-unit.target: Flusso di risorsa per l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsImage" /> con <paramref name="resourceId" /> specificato.

trans-unit.source: The identifier of the resource dictionary.
trans-unit.target: L'identificatore del dizionario della risorsa.

trans-unit.source: Acquires the resource stream for a specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsResourceDictionary" />.
trans-unit.target: Acquisisce il flusso di risorsa per un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsResourceDictionary" /> specificato.

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] resource stream for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsResourceDictionary" /> that has the specified <paramref name="resourceId" />.
trans-unit.target: Flusso di risorsa [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] per l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsResourceDictionary" /> con il parametro <paramref name="resourceId" /> specificato.

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of <see cref="P:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.LinkTargets" /> for the current page content.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce un elenco di <see cref="P:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.LinkTargets" /> per il contenuto della pagina corrente.

trans-unit.source: The list of <see cref="P:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.LinkTargets" /> for the current page content.
trans-unit.target: L'elenco di <see cref="P:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.LinkTargets" /> per il contenuto della pagina corrente.

trans-unit.source: Acquires the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" /> for the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument" />.
trans-unit.target: Acquisisce <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" /> per l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument" /> corrente.

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xml-md.md)] writer for the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument" />.
trans-unit.target: Writer di [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xml-md.md)] per l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument" /> corrente.

trans-unit.source: Acquires the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" /> for the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence" />.
trans-unit.target: Acquisisce <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" /> per l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence" /> corrente.

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xml-md.md)] writer for the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence" />.
trans-unit.target: Writer di [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xml-md.md)] per l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence" /> corrente.

trans-unit.source: Acquires the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" /> for the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage" />.
trans-unit.target: Acquisisce <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" /> per l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage" /> corrente.

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xml-md.md)] writer for the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage" />.
trans-unit.target: Writer di [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xml-md.md)] per l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage" /> corrente.

trans-unit.source: Acquires the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" /> for the current page.
trans-unit.target: Acquisisce il <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" /> per la pagina corrente.

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xml-md.md)] writer for the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage" />.
trans-unit.target: Writer di [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xml-md.md)] per l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage" /> corrente.

trans-unit.source: Acquires the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" /> for the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsResourceDictionary" />.
trans-unit.target: Acquisisce <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" /> per l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsResourceDictionary" /> corrente.

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xml-md.md)] writer for the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsResourceDictionary" />.
trans-unit.target: Writer di [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xml-md.md)] per l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsResourceDictionary" /> corrente.

trans-unit.source: Gets the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] of the current fixed document.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] del documento fisso corrente.

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] of the current fixed document.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] del documento fisso corrente.

trans-unit.source: Gets the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] of the current fixed page.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] della pagina fissa corrente.

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] of the current fixed page.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] della pagina fissa corrente.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage" />, <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument" />, or <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence" /> is added to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument" />.
trans-unit.target: Si verifica quando <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage" />, <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument" />, o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence" /> vengono aggiunti a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument" />.

trans-unit.source: The print ticket to store as part of the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] document.
trans-unit.target: Il print ticket per archiviare come parte del documento [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: Stores a specified <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintTicket" /> as part of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument" />.
trans-unit.target: Archivia un <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintTicket" /> specificato come parte di <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument" />.

trans-unit.source: This method does not validate or modify the specified `printTicket` for a particular <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo non convalida né modifica l'oggetto specificato `printTicket` per un particolare <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>.

trans-unit.source: If necessary, use the <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.MergeAndValidatePrintTicket%2A> method to create a <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> that is specific to the <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue> and is valid for a specified printer.
trans-unit.target: Se necessario, utilizzare il <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.MergeAndValidatePrintTicket%2A> metodo per creare un <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> specifico di <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue> ed è valido per una stampante specificata.

trans-unit.source: Prepares to commit the current page to the output store.
trans-unit.target: Prepara ad eseguire il commit della pagina corrente con l'archivio output.

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] of the resource to associate with the current page.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] della risorsa da associare alla pagina corrente.

trans-unit.source: The identifying name of the <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship" /> that associates the current page with the specified resource.
trans-unit.target: Il nome identificativo di <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship" /> che associa la pagina corrente alla risorsa specificata.

trans-unit.source: Adds a <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship" /> with a specified name that associates a specified resource with the current page.
trans-unit.target: Aggiunge <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship" /> con un nome specificato che associa una risorsa specificata alla pagina corrente.

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] of the restricted font to associate with the current document.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] del tipo di carattere con restrizioni da associare al documento corrente.

trans-unit.source: Adds a <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship" /> that associates a restricted font with the current document.
trans-unit.target: Aggiunge <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship" /> che associa un tipo di carattere con restrizioni al documento corrente.

trans-unit.source: Releases the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsResourceStream" /> for the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsColorContext" />.
trans-unit.target: Rilascia <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsResourceStream" /> per l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsColorContext" /> corrente.

trans-unit.source: Releases the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsResourceStream" /> for the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsFont" />.
trans-unit.target: Rilascia <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsResourceStream" /> per l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsFont" /> corrente.

trans-unit.source: Releases the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsResourceStream" /> for the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsFont" />.
trans-unit.target: Rilascia <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsResourceStream" /> per l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsFont" /> corrente.

trans-unit.source: The identifier of the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] font that you want to release.
trans-unit.target: L'identificatore del tipo di carattere di [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] che si vuole rilasciare.

trans-unit.source: Releases the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsResourceStream" /> for a specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsFont" />.
trans-unit.target: Rilascia <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsResourceStream" /> per <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsFont" />specificato.

trans-unit.source: Releases the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsResourceStream" /> for the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsImage" />.
trans-unit.target: Rilascia <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsResourceStream" /> per l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsImage" /> corrente.

trans-unit.source: Releases the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsResourceStream" /> for the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsResourceDictionary" />.
trans-unit.target: Rilascia <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsResourceStream" /> per l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsResourceDictionary" /> corrente.

trans-unit.source: Releases the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" /> for the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument" />.
trans-unit.target: Rilascia <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" /> per l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument" /> corrente.

trans-unit.source: Releases the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" /> for the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence" />.
trans-unit.target: Rilascia <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" /> per l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence" /> corrente.

trans-unit.source: Releases the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" /> for the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage" />.
trans-unit.target: Rilascia <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" /> per l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage" /> corrente.
